messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Randy Willis's package store on Highway 10 West.
What's the problem?

I live right behind him, and his burglar alarm went off. I called down there because I saw him just get in the store, and I saw somebody run behind the store. I think somebody's in there with him now.
Okay, hold on for me. You said Randy's in the store?
Yes.
And you saw somebody run from the back of the store?
Yeah, there's somebody in there with him because I heard somebody threatening him. I had him on the phone to see if he was okay, and I heard somebody in there threatening him.
So you heard somebody in the store?
Yes.
Okay, hold on one second. Which way did they go?
They went out the back door, but I can still hear them with Randy. I kept hearing him say, 'Pull up your GD shirts.' I called to see if Randy was okay.
What's your address?
I live right behind the store.
What is your name?
Melinda Dellinger. Hey, those two just went that way.
What's the phone number you're calling from?
Okay, tell me exactly what you've seen.

I live right behind the store. I heard the burglar alarm go off at 3:16, so I grabbed my cell phone and called his house. He lives two houses behind me. I told his wife the alarm was going off, and she said okay. I kept looking out the window to see if I saw any cars leave. Then I saw Randy pull in; as soon as he pulled in, two guys ran from the back of the store.
Could you tell what they looked like?
No, it was dark out there. One had a big coat on, looked like a big guy.
Can you tell what color the coats were?
No, they may have been dark brown. I'm not really sure.
Which way did you see them go?
Directly in between my house and the woods. I live right behind the store.
Was that before or after you heard somebody threaten him?
That was before I heard someone threaten him. When I saw them go up, I was concerned because I didn't see any vehicles. So I called his cell phone.
What's Randy's cell phone number?
Oh, Lord. I can't even remember now. Hold on one second.
Are you able to check on your phone to see what it is?
I don't know how to do that.
You can go into the phone book on your phone and it should say details. Click on that and it should have the number.
If I call you back, will it cut us off?
It may cut us off. If it does, just call back on 911.
I will.
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
We had a break-in on Highway 10 West, Randy Willis's store.
Are you Randy?
No, there's been shots fired. Somebody is down. We need an ambulance now.
Randy Willis's store on Highway 10 West?
Somebody's been shot?
Yes.
Is the shooter still there?
Yes, he's the owner. They broke in and beat him up. He shot them.
So, Randy is the shooter?
Yes, Randy shot the assailants.
Hold on for a minute. Are you still there?
Yes, one is in the parking lot.
Are you Randy?
I'm his son.
What is your name?
Dennis Willis. My dad is bleeding.
Where is he bleeding?
His face.
Was he shot in the face?
No, my dad shot the other guy who was shot in the chest.
We've got an ambulance on the way. Your dad shot the two assailants?
Yes, they tried to shoot him first. He wrestled the gun away and shot them.
Where were they shot?
One in the chest and one in the face.
Do you know the people who broke in?
My dad said he had seen them before.
Alright, we've got help on the way. Stay on the phone with me.
They're here now.
Okay. Thank you.
